page.title: 07SHIREBROOK COLLIERY cont'd
page.content: Q. Could a woman do the manager's job? A. The only criteria for the manager's job is a qualification in Mining Law. There is no logical reason why a woman should not be a manager. Q. When was the last time a man died? A. About 4 years ago. Q. Could a person from another pit meet a person from this pit? A. Yes, in the early 19th. century. Q. Has the pit ever been on fire? A. Yes, once. They had to seal a face off during the strike. Q. Have you ever found any oil? A. Yes. Only in small quantities. Q. Have you ever found any gas? A. Yes. The gas underground is piped to the surface where it is burnt off and used to heat the water for the baths.We are virtually self-sufficient
